message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $130. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $110 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $110 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $125. This is my final offer. Let me know what you think.
